title: Shade in the Side of the Boundary Line
text: $$(0,0)$$ is not a solution to $$x \leq -1$$. Since $$(0,0)$$ is on the right side of the line, so we shade in the left side of the line $$x=-1$$ in green.\n##figure2.gif##

title: Graph Second Inequality
text: Graph $$y \geq 3$$ on the same grid. Recognize that it is a horizontal line through $$y=3$$.

title: Overlap Shading
text: The solution is all points in the darker shaded region.
